ModMetaData.name: Better Speed
ModMetaData.author: Fumblesneeze
ModMetaData.description:
Tweaks speed settings globally and adds a new carry weight penalty mechanic:
- Pawns will walk slower the more they carry - Pawns generally walk faster - Pawns generally shoot faster - Doors generally open faster
All the settings are customizable in the game using the mod settings.
Requires HugsLib to be installed and loaded previously.
Made using Harmony.
